Package com.marginallyclever.convenience

Class ColorPalette

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.convenience.ColorPalette
public class ColorPalette
extends Object
Color palette for quantization
Since:
7.1.4-SNAPSHOT
Author:
danroyer

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected List<ColorRGB> colors
    List of colors in the form of red, green, and blue data values.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ColorPalette()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addColor​(ColorRGB c)
    add a color to the palette.
    double[] convertCMYKtoRGB​(double c, double m, double y, double k)
    The R,G,B values are given in the range of 0..255.
    double[] convertRGBtoCMYK​(double r, double g, double b)
    The black key (K) color is calculated from the red (R'), green (G') and blue (B') colors: K = 1-max(R', G', B') The cyan color (C) is calculated from the red (R') and black (K) colors: C = (1-R'-K) / (1-K) The magenta color (M) is calculated from the green (G') and black (K) colors: M = (1-G'-K) / (1-K) The yellow color (Y) is calculated from the blue (B') and black (K) colors: Y = (1-B'-K) / (1-K) see http://www.rapidtables.com/convert/color/rgb-to-cmyk.htm
    ColorRGB getColor​(int index)
    get the color at a given index.
    int numColors()  
    ColorRGB quantize​(ColorRGB c)
    find the color in the palette that most closely matches a given color.
    int quantizeIndex​(ColorRGB c)
    Find the index of the color in the palette that most closely matches a given color.
    void removeColor​(ColorRGB c)
    Removes a given color if it exists in colors.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public void removeColor​(ColorRGB c)

      Parameters:
      c - color to remove. See Iterating through a list, avoiding ConcurrentModificationException when removing in loop

    • quantizeIndex

      public int quantizeIndex​(ColorRGB c)
      Find the index of the color in the palette that most closely matches a given color.
      Parameters:
      c - the color to match
      Returns:
      the index into the color palette of the closest match

    • convertRGBtoCMYK

      public double[] convertRGBtoCMYK​(double r, double g, double b)
      The black key (K) color is calculated from the red (R'), green (G') and blue (B') colors: K = 1-max(R', G', B') The cyan color (C) is calculated from the red (R') and black (K) colors: C = (1-R'-K) / (1-K) The magenta color (M) is calculated from the green (G') and black (K) colors: M = (1-G'-K) / (1-K) The yellow color (Y) is calculated from the blue (B') and black (K) colors: Y = (1-B'-K) / (1-K) see http://www.rapidtables.com/convert/color/rgb-to-cmyk.htm
      Parameters:
      r - in the range 0...255
      g - in the range 0...255
      b - in the range 0...255

    • convertCMYKtoRGB

      public double[] convertCMYKtoRGB​(double c, double m, double y, double k)
      The R,G,B values are given in the range of 0..255. The red (R) color is calculated from the cyan (C) and black (K) colors: R = 255 × (1-C) × (1-K) The green color (G) is calculated from the magenta (M) and black (K) colors: G = 255 × (1-M) × (1-K) The blue color (B) is calculated from the yellow (Y) and black (K) colors: B = 255 × (1-Y) × (1-K) see http://www.rapidtables.com/convert/color/cmyk-to-rgb.htm
      Parameters:
      c -
      m -
      y -
      k -
